general.Email_Footer_1: This message was sent because you have an account registered with
general.Email_Footer_3: You may be able to opt out of these emails in your user settings.

panel.SignIn_IPVerified: Your IP has been verified. You can now sign in to Saturn.
panel.Register_AccountsApprove: Saturn accounts must be approved by the website owner before you can access them.
panel.PendingApproval: Your Saturn account is now pending approval, we'll send you an email when you're ready to get started.
panel.BugFree_Contact: Found a problem? Let us know!
panel.Article_Unavailable: Sorry, this article is temporarily unavailable.
panel.Article_ReadOther: Why not read one of our other great articles?
panel.VerificationCode_Message_2: Please enter this code into Saturn to proceed.
panel.VerificationCode_Email: Please check your email and do not exit this page.
panel.Reset_CanLogin: You can now log in using your new credentials.
panel.Reset_EmailConfirm: We've sent you an email to confirm the information you have provided. Please click the link in your email to continue.
panel.Verify_EnterCode: To help us keep your account secure please enter the security code we've sent to your email address in the box below.
panel.Verify_NewLocation: We've detected that you're attempting to sign in from a new location.

error.404_Info: Error code: 404. If you clicked a link on our website, please contact us to let us know it's broken. If you typed in the page URL yourself, please check your spelling and try again.
error.FrameworkUnassigned: Unable to load framework or a framework may not be assigned.
error.CCV: CCV: Website configuration does not match checksum.
error.SMTP_1: SMTP is not implemented yet, please check your config.php file and visit https://docs.saturncms.net/v/
error.EmailFunction_1: Email function not specified correctly, please check your config.php file and visit https://docs.saturncms.net/v/
error.DebugEnabled: Debug Mode is ENABLED. This is NOT recommended in production environments. You can disable this in your site configuration settings.
error.NotActivated: Activation: Saturn is not activated, certain features may be unavailable. You can still use some features of Saturn unactivated. You can activate Saturn in your Admin Panel.
error.EmailExists: A user with this email address already exists.
error.EmailBlank: Email address must not be blank.
error.CodeNotMatch: The verification code that you provided does not match the code that we sent.
error.Code: An error occurred whilst generating a code. Please try again later.
error.Error: Sorry there was an error, please try again later.
error.Signin_Empty: Username or Password can not be empty.
error.Signin_Required: You need to sign in to access this area.
error.Reset_UsernameRequired: Please enter a username or email address.
error.Reset_PasswordNotMatch: The password and confirmed password provided does not match. Please try again.
error.Reset_PasswordEmpty: You did not enter a password and confirmed password. Please try again.
error.Reset_Unknown: An error occurred when resetting a user's password.
error.Account_NotApproved: Your account has not been approved by a site administrator yet. We'll send you an email when we're ready for you to sign in.
error.Account_Restricted: Your account has been restricted. If you require access please contact your administrator.
error.Account_Deleted: Your account has been deleted. If you require access please contact your site administrator by emailing
error.Account_FailedLogin_1: Failed login attempt by user to account
error.UnknownAccount: Sorry, we were unable to determine what account the data you entered belongs to. Please try a different method of authentication.
error.Unknown: An error has occurred, please try again later.
error.AccessPermissions: You do not have the required permissions to access Saturn, this may be because your account is pending approval or has been restricted.
error.Verify_Unknown: The user verification system has been triggered, but we're not quite sure why. If you experience any issues please go back and sign in again or contact your website administrator for help. If this is a reoccurring issue you can also report it at saturncms.net/reportbug and we'll look into it for you.
